content: I’m about to speak to ,@,alicrew, on ,@,ABCNewsradio, about Peter Dutton’s  visa offer to South African white farmers. SPOILER ALERT: I think he’s racist or criminally naive. Or both.
WARNING: I hardly think a proven self loathing white SAcan virtue signaller like Mr Grootes is qualified to give a balanced view on this matter. Just my opinion.

Whites settled in South Africa during the 1400-1600's much earlier than the USA. There were no black tribes anywhere to be seen. Much later the white farmers encountered these nomadic tribes further up north. Technically speaking South Africa belongs to the white settlers.

Agreed, he is. Disgustingly so. But our SA farmers cannot go on being tortured and murdered and nobody here does a thing about it. And now, what are they to think when they have the perceived threat of their land being taken from them.

The train was hijacked in mamelodi,a victim is a black female,she was stripped naked,assaulted and humiliated,anybody can be touched by crime in this country,crime is colour blind in this country..I blame apartheid,it manufactured all of this behaviour..

Yes, crime can hit anyone. A precious friend of mine had the same thing happen as she got out of the taxi. It is disgusting and I have no words for the perpetrators, Apartheid cannot be blamed tho, for the evilness of mans hearts of rape, murder and torture of all colours.
Apartheid can be blamed for the inequality that forced black people into poverty which is somewhat linked to crime.
Ek dog jy sou visas vir blanke boere ondersteun - dan is jy tog finaal ontslae van die rassiste?
Hoe kan jy 'n hele groep mense as geheel beswadder - hulle verteenwoordig nou wel nie 'n hele ras nie, maar is dit nie essensieël die denkfout wat rassiste maak nie?

We must stop sending the wrong message to the outside world. They are reacting to fist waving politicians vowing to take land without compensation and then it is announced from Parliament.. What else must concerned outsiders think..

Hm - we told daily to leave we are colonists we are thieves - we want to go - we don't want to live in this crime ridden cesspot of corruption & self-entitlement and victims - we want safe quality lives with meaning. Cheers we done being used.
The Aussies r refusing to give refuge to people from war torn countries like Syria and Afghanistan. This call to welcome whites from a stable country exposes their true nature
Why? If journalists were murdered same as farmers you would be running for the hills too. Why do you racialist everything?

There is most definitely a specific group of individuals who are permanently scratching at the scab of our history. And we know who they are. There are no innocent here. Just opportunists. And racism is their currency, stock and trade.

I disagree. You need to get a perspective on what outsiders think of SA. My experience is that the pervading view is that SA is a slowly building catastrophe. And it not Afriforum contributing to this view.
So, name another civilised country that would expropriate another race without compensation, because the ruling criminals face an election that can't be won without stirring up hatred.
He may be, but stuck with the racism emanating from within SA I give him full marks for being progressive
Not often I have to disagree with you Stephen, but afraid I must today.
Perhaps the naivety is on our side
You forgot daft Sir.
During Apartheid, the Nat's were as outraged about external countries interfering, Many welcomed our exiles.

Just a criminal racist; forbidding people experiencing extreme hatred, brutality and genocide as in the Rohingya to ever enter the country ... zero UNHCR visas as he hears of their daily horrors. Really happy to take middle class whites though.
“Peter Dutton should put his dog whistle back in his pocket”. Great interview today on ABC - the good people of Australia salute you ,@,StephenGrootes
Thank Stephen, I fully agree with you. Those who are willing to relocate must pack and go. We will gladly occupy those majestic plots. I need a Nature Reserve. Thank You
Both
Stephen Grootes pls start using your brain.

Leftist socialists always try to shut down free speech with labels like 'racist'.
Really, Stephen, that's pathetic! Go read the 'Gulag Archipelago' and see why there is REAL cause for concern. You are naive in your ideological obsession.
Just listened to the show, wow you come off as a posh self righteous doos, lol, I think you probably helped Dutton here, congrats.
Completely agree
And Australian...
He's Australian...
please explain!
You don't represent Afrikaners?
Racist
